original_text: King Darius decided to choose 120 men to rule the regions of his nation. Together, they would rule the whole kingdom.
korean_text: 다리오가 자기의 뜻대로 고관 백이십 명을 세워 전국을 통치하게 하고

sentences.original_text: King Darius decided to choose 120 men
to rule the regions of his nation
Together, they would rule the whole kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 함께 그들은 전체 왕국을 다스릴 것입니다
